flavor:
That moment of bliss. That feeling of accomplishment. That certainty of purpose.
What's next?
printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Access 1 installed card (non-ice).
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Access 1 installed card (non-ice).

flavor: Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.
printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. [click], 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. click, 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.

flavor: Stick with your plan and you'll be fine. Stick with the plan.
printed_text: Whenever a gray ops or black ops operation is trashed after resolving, you may give the Corp 1 bad publicity and take 1 tag. [trash]: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever a gray ops or black ops operation is trashed after resolving, you may give the Corp 1 bad publicity and take 1 tag. trash: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.

flavor: "When you need someone who is a little more hands on, look me up." -Silhouette
printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Reveal all cards in HQ.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Reveal all cards in HQ.

flavor: The power of the focused mind is a power beyond comprehension.
printed_text: +2[mu] Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +2 mu Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: "CyberSolutions is a boring name for a company that makes pretty exciting products. Their memory chips have some pretty tricky stuff going on inside and I keep hearing good things about their M/MI implants. I even heard they were on the path to their own androids about a year ago. I wonder whatever happened with that?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
stripped_printed_text: +2 mu

printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.

printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the innermost piece of ice protecting a server
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the innermost piece of ice protecting a server

printed_text:
Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity.
Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.

flavor: Blue-one level clearance doesn't exist. And if it did exist, you wouldn't be cleared to know about it.
printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Gain 5[credit] and draw 2 cards.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Gain 5 credits and draw 2 cards.

printed_text: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server, the Runner must spend [click]. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
stripped_printed_text: Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server, the Runner must spend click. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

printed_text:
Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced.
If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.
stripped_printed_text: Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced. If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.

flavor: The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
printed_text:
[subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.

flavor: He slowly pried open the lid, and the tantō glinted madly in the half-light. The executive motioned to the blade. Looks like the meeting was being cut short.
printed_text: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.

printed_text:
If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it.
Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.
stripped_printed_text: If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it. Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.

flavor: "It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise
printed_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text: You start the game with 10[credit] and 1 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: You start the game with 10 credits and 1 bad publicity.

flavor: "I did warn you that leaks would have to be patched."
printed_text:
When you score Vulcan Coverup, do 2 meat damage.
When the Runner steals Vulcan Coverup, take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Vulcan Coverup, do 2 meat damage. When the Runner steals Vulcan Coverup, take 1 bad publicity.

flavor: GRNDL refineries process many different rare elements unearthed during the fracking process.
printed_text:
GRNDL Refinery can be advanced.
[click], [trash]: Gain 4[credit] for each advancement token on GRNDL Refinery.
stripped_printed_text: GRNDL Refinery can be advanced. click, trash: Gain 4 credits for each advancement token on GRNDL Refinery.

printed_text:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 1 credit. The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain click. When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
